programmes.show_description: India Matters: Where the day's biggest stories get Shiv Aroor's sharp, unsparing take.
When you want to know what happened in India & around the world, keep track of the weather, the latest in sports and business, NDTV News will keep you well informed and up-to-date.
The breakfast show that sets the agenda for the day. Join our reporters for news updates and get all the updates on what happened overnight.

A show that brings you the big news, interviews, debates and of course the very latest from our turbulent neighbours. If it's making news, it's on the show!
The day's biggest news dissected by the day's newsmakers. Diverse opinions from across the political spectrum. The show that makes you decide, are you on the left, right or the centre?
